ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it is a race skill like Foraging and hiding for elves. You start as a gnome wit a 50% but it can not be raised till 16th
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it is a race skill like Foraging and hiding for elves. You start as a gnome wit a 50% but it can not be raised till 16th


<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Zach Heaven [SMTP:zheaven@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 3:38 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] rumors

From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>

Holy S***!!! You mean I can tinker WITHOUT having to
be level 16??!?!??!

--- corenee <corenee@...> wrote:
> From: corenee <corenee@...>
>
> first i would like to say ya'll are doin a great
> thing here. Here's what
> i have heard, there are three other books(besides
> the two at mills)
> where or when you get em is beyond me. I too have
> made the firewater,
> and the lantern, and say one person auctioning off
> the cams for the
> bows, so i know those have been made also. As has
> already been posted i
> too heard that the infravision goggles instructions
> came from a quest.
> Which one i don't know. Also i know as a fact that
> you can tinker
> successfully at level 1, but cannot gain any skill
> level til level 16.
> So all of you that are waiting to try it, go for
> it...it will work, i
> decided to try it at level 11 with my gnome, and
> made fire water on
> first try. Also i believe that you can make the
> thermal cloak from just
> about any cloak...doesn't have to be tattered... I
> am wanting to try
> similar things with lanterns ans stuff..(i.e. use
> small lantern and
> such). If anyone has tried it with other items
> please let me know.
>
> Jaqui(math marr)
>
>
>
